medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain with nausea and vomiting
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began in the morning of her presentation, with nausea and vomiting lasting for 48 hours. Vomitus started as clear yellow, progressed to bilious. Patient denies diarrhea, bright red blood per rectum, fever, chills, or night sweats.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Osteoarthritis, Diverticulosis, Hypertension, Hypothyroidism, COPD, Cardiac arrhythmias (heart murmur and palpitations)
